name: The Stettheimer Salon Experience: La Fete a Duchamp
name_original: The Stettheimer Salon Experience: La Fete a Duchamp
description:
The year is 1917. You are an up-and-coming young poet in New York City and you have been invited by the renowned salonieres, the Stettheimer sisters, to Marcel Duchamp's 30th birthday party. Choose to interact with Ettie, Carrie, or Florine, for a completely different path through this interactive story. 

This game was built in Twine 1.4.2 and made for my class CC8829 Modernist Literary Circles: A Cultural Approach. This game is based on the actual birthday party the Stettheimer sisters threw for Marcel Duchamp.
